connection Struct Reference

#include <connection.h>


Data Fields

enum notes_protocols protocol

Detailed Description

A description of a notes server, including all of the information needed to connect to that server.

Field Documentation

enum notes_protocols connection::protocol

The protocol to use to connect.

char* connection::user

The username to connect as.

char* connection::system

The system to connect to.

unsigned short connection::port

The port to connect to.
